name: Giant Four-Armed Gargoyle
resistance: bludgeoning, piercing and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks not made with adamantine weapons

traits.name: False appearance
traits.desc: While the gargoyle remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an inanimate statue.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The gargoyle makes five attacks: one with its bite and four with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 +4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d4 +4) slashing damage.
